2090340.name: PunchBots Demo
2090340.description:
PunchBots is a game for up to 4 players. Compete with your friends while you play on the couch or practice against bots.

You can play with a keyboard and controller is easy to learn like no other game.

Among the Main Features Are:

  • 6 different areas to choose from where you can face your friends with a total of 18 different arenas.

  • Different power ups that you will find during the gameplay (rocket fists, extra speed, double fists, others)

  • The possibility of adding bots to complete the fights

  • A test area to learn the basic controls and power ups of the game.

Follow us in our Discord community for news and development progress.
2090340.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
